text: Valdemar Rodrigues Martíns, best known as Oreco, (born in Santa Maria, Rio Grande do Sul, June 13, 1932 – April 3, 1985 in Ituverava, São Paulo) was a footballer who played for Brazil at the 1958 FIFA World Cup. ==Club career statistics== |- |1970||rowspan="3"|Dallas Tornado||rowspan="3"|NASL||17||0 |- |1971||16||0 |- |1972||5||0 38||0 38||0 |} ==References== Category:1932 births Category:1985 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Oreco
